CustomField.description: Give week number of a year for the case close time.
CustomField.formula:
If (IsClosed,
Case( MOD( DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)), 1, 1) - DATE (1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 3) /7, 1, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 4) /7, 2, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 5) /7, 3, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 6) /7, 4, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 7) /7, 5, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 1) /7, 6, ( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)- DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate)),1,1) + 2) /7, 99), 0)
CustomField.label: Case Closure Week
